description: This file is a Kotlin DSL script used for configuring Android project build settings, including repositories and build directories setup.

methods.name: rootProject.layout.buildDirectory.dir
methods.description: Defines the directory path for the root project's build directory.

methods.name: rootProject.layout.buildDirectory.value
methods.description: Sets the build directory value for the root project.

methods.name: project.layout.buildDirectory.value
methods.description: Sets the build directory for subprojects.

methods.name: tasks.register
methods.description: Registers a new task, in this case, a 'clean' task of type Delete.
